name: IMPLEMENTATION OF IT IN LAW ENFORCEMENT
short_description: This project seeks to make a difference in the technological world,by coming up with an architectural schema that seamlessly integrates all the features existing in different security system,thereby eliminating the need of having to deal with bits and pieces of individual system,to track down crime perpetrators.Also,the integration of existing features in different security system places law enforcement agents at an advantageous point,in that,it equips them with sufficient time and information,in dealing with crime.Moreover,the architectural schema of this proposed system is designed with the idea of providing vital information,‘on the fly’ by making this system available to law enforcement agencies,on the web.This way,agents can retrieve and send vital information,while on the field (crime scenes).Transfer of cataloged evidence to police facility,will no more be necessary.
summary: A system that will help law enforcers in their fight against crime
